body.name: Voom Sonic Go 1 Series Travel Electric Toothbrush Travel Toothbrushes - Battery Operated Toothbrush for Adults & Kids, Dentist Recommended Toothbrush, Portable with 2 Minute Timer (Metallic Rose)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 2 mins
features: Dentist Recommended: The Go 1 Series Travel Electric Toothbrush is a dentist recommended, battery operated, portable sonic toothbrush that infuses innovative technology with functionality and design. Our Electronic Toothbrush is one of a kind as it features 22,000 vibrations per minute, vented cap for hygiene, and a 2-minute on/off feature and 30 second quadrant pacer.

Fashionable and Convenient: No need to store your toothbrush in ugly, bulky, traveling cases. Start traveling with the Go 1 Series Travel Toothbrush. The Go 1 electronic toothbrush comes in an assortment of tasteful, elegant, and sleek designs. Brushing can now be a fun, convenient part of your daily routine, whether at home, office, gym or away on travel. The Go 1 Series toothbrush takes the effort out of efficient oral care.

Packs a Punch: Don’t let its slim design or its lightweight feel mislead you. The Go 1 Series Sonic Toothbrush will give you the best teeth cleaning on the go. This battery operated toothbrush for adults & kids features 22,000 strokes per minute, blowing any old manual toothbrush out of the water with its advanced technology. This amazing, fully functional sonic toothbrush features one AAA battery and one additional brush head.

Take your Toothbrush on The Go: The Go 1 Series electronic toothbrush is only 6-½” long x ¾” wide making it the perfect addition to your hygiene regimen. Throw it in your purse, your suitcase, or clear up some counter space with its small and lightweight design.

Feel The Voom: Here at Voom Sonic we take pride in our teeth and understand that our smiles can be our biggest asset. Voom Sonic was created for those that are passionate about oral hygiene as much as we are. We have collaborated with the best manufacturers all over the world with the sole focus of creating an innovative, technologically advanced, electronic toothbrush that will give you the clean you need.
body.description: Who said you can only get a thorough and effective teeth cleaning at the dentist’s office? The Go 1 Series Sonic Toothbrush is a dentist recommended, battery operated, portable sonic toothbrush that infuses innovative technology with functionality and patented design. This electric toothbrush is one of a kind as it features 22,000 vibrations per minute, vented cap for hygiene, and a 2-minute on/off feature. The Go 1 Series toothbrush takes the effort out of efficient oral care. This amazing, fully functional sonic toothbrush features one AAA battery and one additional brush head. Here at Voom Sonic we take pride in our teeth and understand that our smiles can be our biggest asset. Voom Sonic was created for those that are passionate about oral hygiene as much as we are. We have collaborated with the best manufacturers all over the world with the sole focus of creating an innovative, technologically advanced, electronic toothbrush that will give you the clean you need.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: VOOM SONIC GO 1 SERIES TRAVEL TOOTHBRUSH For Healthier Smiles, Choose Voom Sonic! Soft Dupont Replaceable Brush HeadBattery Operated (AAA Batteries Included)2-minute On/off Feature and 30 Second Quadrant Pacer Introducing the Voom Sonic Go 1 Series Travel Electric Toothbrush - your ultimate companion for maintaining optimal oral hygiene on the go. With its compact design, powerful sonic technology, and a range of convenient features, this toothbrush is a must-have for frequent travelers and busy individuals.

SELECT FROM 10 DIFFERENT COLORS | THE TRAVEL TOOTHBRUSH FOR ON THE GO! The Voom Sonic Go 1 Series Travel Toothbrush is a Dental Game-Changer that takes your oral care to extraordinary heights! Embrace the dentist-recommended innovation, boasting a mind-blowing 22,000 vibrations per minute, delivering a power-packed clean like never before. Say goodbye to dull and mundane toothbrushes. The Go 1 Series redefines style and convenience with its chic and elegant designs, making it a fashionable must-have for your daily routine. Experience effortless oral care, whether at home, work, gym, or during your exciting travels. Keep your oral care on point no matter where life takes you. Get ready to experience the Voom Sonic revolution - a brand that breathes passion for impeccable oral hygiene. Teaming up with top manufacturers worldwide, we've crafted an innovative electronic toothbrush that redefines excellence. Sized Right at 6-½”x ¾” (LXW)Travelers Best FriendDentist RecommendedAnywhere, Anyplace, Anytime!Designed for individuals on the GO!

Here Are More Reasons On What Makes Us The Better Choice! Includes AAA Batteries We've integrated a 30-day standby feature, allowing you to conveniently store your toothbrush without the need to constantly change batteries. Batteries come included with every purchase. Waterproof Our waterproof rating ensures that your toothbrush is fully protected against water ingress, allowing for effortless cleaning and maintenance. You can easily rinse the brush head under running water or even use it while enjoying a relaxing bath or shower. 60-Day Review We are so confident in the exceptional performance and quality of our toothbrush that we're offering you the opportunity to try it for a full 60 days. We believe that once you try our toothbrush, you won't want to go back to your old manual toothbrush. Trusted! By choosing our dentist-recommended electric toothbrush, you can have confidence that you're investing in a product that dental professionals trust and endorse. It's like having a personal dental hygienist in your hand, guiding you towards optimal oral health.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great travel toothbrush. You should buy it.
reviews.reviewText: Pros:- It works very nearly as well as my larger, more powerful Braun electric toothbrush, and that's saying something.- I've found the battery life to be excellent. I have about 50 brushing sessions (and counting) on the original AAA battery, and it's still going strong.- It's extremely packable (but see the con below about the power switch). The cover is exactly the right size and fit, and it packs into my small toiletry bag very well.Cons:- It's easy to press the power button by accident because it sticks out from the side of the handle. While it's never (to my knowledge) accidentally started up while in my luggage, electronics designed for travel should have recessed power buttons.- The toothbrush head itself is a little big. I have a full-sized adult male mouth, and I find it a little awkward getting this toothbrush into places like behind my lower and upper front teeth. It does get in there, but it's awkward.Why I've come to really like this toothbrush:I normally use an electric toothbrush (from Braun), but it's really bigger than I'd like to take traveling. Plus, it's charger requires an AC outlet, and I just don't want to travel with all that. So I've typically traveled with just a regular, manual toothbrush. BUT using an electric toothbrush for many years has really spoiled me. I know exactly how to brush my teeth, but a manual toothbrush just doesn't do as good a job as an electric toothbrush.Reading other reviews of this Voom Sonic toothbrush, I really wasn't sure it would do the trick, so I tried it out for a couple of weeks before my 2-week vacation. My main concerns were efficacy and battery life. Well, it worked great. My teeth didn't feel skuzzy waking up in the morning. I'd planned to put in a new battery immediately before leaving, but I'd noticed no reduction in efficacy during my 2-week trial period, so I figured I'd chance it. (Plus, I knew I could buy AAA batteries in Scotland.) I also expected a bargain-basement battery to be shipped with the toothbrush. But the battery they shipped got through the 2-week pre-trip trial, the 2-week vacation, and has continued over the week since we've been back. That's 5 weeks of consistent use with no reduction in power that I can feel. I've brushed every night before bed, and I'd estimate I've brushed a little over half the mornings. That's about 50 brushing sessions on one battery. I'm very pleased with this and fairly amazed. (And I *still* haven't felt the need to replace the original battery.)So I'd certainly recommend this as a travel toothbrush. It packs well and absolutely does the job of getting my teeth clean. If I had to find something negative about the Voom Sonic toothbrush, I'd prefer a button that isn't so easy to press by mistake. I'm not aware the toothbrush has ever come on in my luggage, but electronics designed for travel should have recessed power buttons. BUT, since this hasn't been an actual, real-world problem for me personally, I'm not going to subtract a star for that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel
reviews.reviewText: I love my home electric toothbrush but is awkward to fit in toiletry kit. This is perfect size to fit. Charges easily and holds charge for a week long trip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight but good
reviews.reviewText: The body/housing of the electric toothbrush feels a little lightweight and flimsy but overall it works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect travel-sized tooth brush!
reviews.reviewText: This is my second time purchasing this product because it has been so convenient for traveling. Apart from being so small, it’s very light. I love being able to travel with an electric tooth brush that isn’t big and clunky, or needs cords and recharging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working at 6 months
reviews.reviewText: It was great until it stopped working after 6 month from using. Battery change didn't do anything. It was never wet and the inside was dry b/c I've never opened until today to change the battery which did nothing. Only change I did was the brush head. It is affordable, portable and good but basically once the initial battery is out at 6 months (another reviewer had the same issue) you need to buy a new one. Considering that the price isn't cheap. I also bought brush head replacements so overall it didn't perform or last as quip did which has issue with the water gets into inside and perform poorly. There is no warrantee info for this item so this is quite frustrating. It seems this tooth brush is made for one time - 6month use. Disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific travel/purse toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: The pretty rose gold color first caught my eye when browsing for a travel toothbrush, but I find it to be highly functional, as well, perfect for my needs. This is a wonderful battery operated toothbrush for those who bring them everywhere. It is lightweight, and not much larger than a mascara tube. I was delightfully surprised by how quiet it is when in use. The bristles are soft, which works perfectly for me. Replacement heads are available. This will be my go-to travel toothbrush for the foreseeable future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price and works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars completely died on me a few months after purchase
reviews.reviewText: I use this item for traveling, and it completely died on me a few months after purchase. I obviously wasn't using it the entire time because it's for travel. A battery change did not solve the problem. Also, the battery cover piece won't stay on. Amazon provides a link to Voom Sonic's website for customer support, but the website has no way to contact them -- no email, phone or chat. They only provide a space to sign up for emails. I also bought replacement brushes but obviously can no longer use them, so I wasted money on them, too. I finally found a way to reach Amazon customer service (not easy to find this), and they have no way to connect me with the manufacturer to figure out what is going on with my product, which is obviously not true because they have a vendor/seller relationship. This product is a waste of money. Very disappointed in the product AND Amazon.
